Brix and Fliq

Brix and Fliq go into what's left of the bridge, and head over to the 
CR Chambers.

"All right, this is what we do," said Brix, "We work here for a few 
hours, try to get them as close to a hundred percent as we can. Than 
we rest. Say good-bye, do whatever we want. We have a long day 
tomorrow, and we might not make it."

Brix and Fliq start working again on the CR Chambers.

Vulois

Vulois lands in front of a huge contraption. No one is around him 
Child and Windrazor are still a few minutes behind, so he calls back 
to them.

"Hey, hurry up! Come see this."

It's strange a glittery. Vulois walks right up to it, and wants to 
tough it, but pulls himself back. Than an old voice talks to him.

Do it Vulois. I didn't die to let this dream die.

Vulois recognized the voice:Soundwave. But he knew it wasn't really 
Soundwave. It was Convix, giving him extra encentive. But Convix 
knows best. Vulois took a few more steps, and stepped through the 
portal.

When he came through, he couldn't believe his eyes. A familiar place, 
with no sign of organic life.

"cybertron...."he said to himself in a low voice,"This is it....This 
is it!CYBERTRON!!!!!!"

Vulois turned back and went through the portal, back to Past Earth. H 
eyelled to Child and Windrazor.

"Come quick! You'll never believe what's over here!"
